text:
Funniest Scenes From K3G That Will Teleport You To The World Of Poo, Anjali & The Iconic Raichand Drama
Funniest Scenes From K3G That Will Teleport You To The World Of Poo, Anjali & The Iconic Raichand Drama
"Woh Kaun Hai Jisne Peeche Mud Ke Mujhe Nahi Dekha? Who is he?"
Well even after 17 years of its release, this iconic dialogue from Karan Johar's Kabhi Khushi Kabhi Gham still cracks all of us up. The family drama went on to become one of the cult classics of Bollywood and rightly so.
Dharma
Every character was sketched to perfect with the right mix of drama, emotions and humor. Today, as the film completes 17 years of its release, let's take you on a nostalgia trip.
Here are some of the funniest scenes that will teleport you directly to the madness of the Raichand family!
1. Poo's entry: This iconic scene didn't just become one of the most hilarious scenes of the film but it established Poo's character.
2. Bade Mazaakiya Ho: Anjali and Rahul's romance begins!
Don't Miss 707 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES
3. This one still remains memorable. Kajol and SRK's romance was one happy part of the film. Followed by Anjali's iconic 'Gamla' scene.
4. Kajol's comic timing in the film was praiseworthy!
5. We loved how Poo juggled between vanity and self-obsession!
3. Rahul-TAKE A CHILL PILL
Even KJo is nostalgic today and he took to social media to share a beautiful video. Watch now.
